entry.title: https://github.com/JetBrains/compose-hot-reload
entry.content: Compose Hot Reload: Make changes to your UI code in a Compose Multiplatform application, and see the results in real time. No restarts required. Compose Hot Reload runs your application on a special desktop JVM, and intelligently reloads your code whenever it is changed.
